article_title: The Right Way To Subsidize Health Insurance

article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman

og.description: Although most of us think our health care system is predominantly a private system, government is heavily involved. Close to one in every two health care dollars is spent by government. And even spending that counts as private is heavily subsidized. My back-of-the-envelope estimate puts federal subsidies for private health insurance at roughly [...]
